name: bio-Mech Love War
description:
Love knows no bounds. In a world divided - mechs versus bios - an unlikely union between the two factions developed. Seen as an abomination, the players are bio-mech hybrids who just want to protect their home.

Defend the Heart of your home from the unlikely alliance of mechs and bios!

"bio-Mech Love War" is a 2 or 3 player game.

Controllers are required to play

Left stick: Move
Right stick: Aim / Fire
Shoulder buttons: Fire (Charge shot only)
A button (or X on PS controller): Dash
